items.info: Measure temperature accurately. Hydrate, rest. Use acetaminophen or ibuprofen per label unless contraindicated.
red_flags: Persistent fever > 3 days or in infants < 3 months

items.info: If crushing, radiating to arm/jaw, associated with shortness of breath, sweating, or nausea—this is an emergency.
red_flags: Pain with shortness of breath, fainting, or palpitations

items.info: Track location, severity, triggers. Hydrate, avoid heavy foods. Seek care if pain is severe or persistent.
red_flags: Fever with localized pain (e.g., right lower abdomen)
